channel.title: VPS Issue - PLEASE help if you can
channel.description:
Hello,
I am using (Trentahost) VPS and i'm having issues.
I have everything in place, i have my no-ip in the client, and the client port is connected to 43594, I made new rules in my firewall accepting both UDP and TCP ports (43594). My source is being ran from my remote desktop connection through trentahost. i have my other computer with the jarred and signed client and i'm attempting to connect, but i continuously get "Error connecting to server."
Does anyone have any clue as to why this may be like this?

item.title: VPS Issue - PLEASE help if you can
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Fixed the issue. Was because the IP address was incorrectly set in the client.

Read full topic
item.source: VPS Issue - PLEASE help if you can
